name: IHEACDCImplementationGuide
title: IHE ACDC Implementation Guide
description: The FHIR IG materials for the IHE AC/DC Profile

resource.name: IHE ACDC Query Artifact AuditEvent Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the AuditEvent Resource for audit messages used with the IHE ACDC Profile [PCC-71] Query Artifact Transaction

resource.name: IHE ACDC Questionnaire Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the Questionnaire Resource for questionnaires used with the IHE ACDC Profile

resource.name: IHE ACDC QuestionnaireResponse Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the QuestionnaireResponse Resource for responses used with the IHE ACDC Profile

resource.name: IHE ACDC Report Assessment AuditEvent Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the AuditEvent Resource for audit messages used with the IHE ACDC Profile [PCC-73] Request Assessment Transaction

resource.name: IHE ACDC Request Assessment AuditEvent Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the AuditEvent Resource for audit messages used with the IHE ACDC Profile [PCC-72] Request Assessment Transaction

resource.name: IHE ACDC Contained Questionnaire Reference Extension
resource.description: Defines the Contained Questionnaire Reference URL Extension used on QuestionnaireResponse Resources used by the IHE ACDC Profile

resource.name: IHE ACDC Launch URL Extension
resource.description: Defines the Launch URL Extension used on Questionnaire Resources used by the IHE ACDC Profile

resource.name: Status Values allowed in a QuestionnaireResponse resource
resource.description: Defines the Status Values allowed in a QuestionnaireResponse resource used withe IHE ACDC Profile

resource.description: An example of a populated AuditEvent sent on completion of the IHE PCC-71 transaction.

resource.description: An example of a populated AuditEvent sent on completion of the IHE PCC-73 transaction.

resource.description: An example of a populated AuditEvent sent on completion of the IHE PCC-72 transaction.
